Package app.ganchyas

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddInfoActivity
    Gets the data of the user and adds to the database.
    EditInfoActivity
    Gets the data from the user and edits the database.
    ForumDisplayActivity
    Shows a forum in a dedicated Activity.
    ForumFragment
    Displays a list of forums.
    LocationFragment
    Displays a map, On the map you can enable your live location and can see other user's current location live location (if they ave enabled id)
    LoginActivity
    Login page to authenticate with firebase authentication.
    MainActivity
    Container that can cycle through the fragments.
    MessagingFragment
    Fragments that shows the users their conversations and allows the starting of new conversations
    MessengerActivity
    Messenger that the users interact with to send and view messages
    NotificationsFragment
    Shows the notifications received by the user
    PasswordChangeActivity
    Allows the user to change their password
    PatchesActivity
    Shows the user a list of application patches that the user can download
    ProfileActivity
    Shows the user their profile and allows them to edit it
    SettingsActivity
    Allows the user to edit the app's preferences
    WriteNewForumImageActivity
    Allows the user to upload a forum with an image
    WriteNewForumTextActivity
    Allow the user to post a forum with only text
    WriteNewForumVideoActivity
    Allows the user to upload a forum with a video
